item.title: Editorial: Ecological Non-equilibrium in the Anthropocene
item.description: Related materials Including #non-#equilibrium processes in #ecological theories and methods is key to addressing the challenges of the #Anthropocene - our editorial for the Special Topic of @FrontEcolEvol edited by @jessicablois @NMoruetaHolme Rominger A and myself https://t.co/oKF9kJlNwV — Gio Rapacciuolo (@giorapac) November 8, 2019
